## FRCEventData type

Payloads of any of the events that can be dispatched by a widget.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type FRCEventData = FRCWidgetStateChangeEventData | FRCWidgetCompleteEventData | FRCWidgetExpireEventData | FRCWidgetErrorEventData | FRCWidgetResetEventData;
```
**References:** [FRCWidgetStateChangeEventData](./friendly-captcha-sdk.frcwidgetstatechangeeventdata.md)<!-- -->, [FRCWidgetCompleteEventData](./friendly-captcha-sdk.frcwidgetcompleteeventdata.md)<!-- -->, [FRCWidgetExpireEventData](./friendly-captcha-sdk.frcwidgetexpireeventdata.md)<!-- -->, [FRCWidgetErrorEventData](./friendly-captcha-sdk.frcwidgeterroreventdata.md)<!-- -->, [FRCWidgetResetEventData](./friendly-captcha-sdk.frcwidgetreseteventdata.md)
